name: Dead Hang on Rope
description: Hanging from rope with arms straight
unlock_requirements: 8 reps x 3 sets of Pull-up Eccentrics, 10 reps x 3 sets of Ring Row

name: Rope Flex Hang
description: Hanging from rope with arms flexed
unlock_requirements: 30s hold of Dead Hang on Rope

name: Rope Pull-up
form_cues: Pull from back, squeeze rope firmly

name: Rope Climb Negatives
description: Climbing up rope with legs, lowering without legs
unlock_requirements: 5 reps x 3 sets of Rope Pull-up

name: Rope Climb with Legs
description: Full rope climb using legs for assistance
unlock_requirements: 5 negatives x 3 sets of Rope Climb Negatives
form_cues: Proper foot lock technique, coordinated movement
